question.xref: DES s5, DES s12, HC r231
question.text: You are driving on an icy road. How can you avoid wheelspin?

explanation.text: If you’re travelling on an icy road extra caution will be required to avoid loss of control. Keeping your speed down and using the highest gear possible will reduce the risk of the tyres losing their grip on this slippery surface.

answer.text: Drive at a slow speed in as high a gear as possible
Use the handbrake if the wheels start to slip
Drive in a low gear at all times
